Home.subtitle: Blockchain Bet Brasil - The Web3 BBB.
Home.pulseText: Win with 5, 4, 3, 2 and even with just 1 point!
Home.description: Application without intermediaries. No manipulation. The first decentralized distribution system operated entirely by Smart Contracts and Chainlink VRF on the Base network.
Home.card1Desc: The contract has no owner. Once started, no one can change rules, pause withdrawals, or manipulate the Matrix. Code is law.
Home.card2Desc: We use the industry standard (Chainlink VRF) to validate predictions. Entropy is generated off-chain and verified on-chain.
Home.card3Desc: The collected value (90%) is locked in the smart contract. At the end of the round, the yield is automatically released for withdrawal.

Apostas.title: Your Entry
Apostas.matrixSub: Select exactly 5 pairs from the 25x25 matrix.
Apostas.audit: This transaction will be registered on the Base blockchain and is auditable via Chainlink VRF.
Apostas.modalDesc: Your 5 predictions are now on the Blockchain.
Apostas.alertWallet: Please connect your wallet to proceed.

ComoFunciona.title: Reference Matrix
ComoFunciona.desc: Understand the system mathematics. Participation consists of strategic selection of pairs (X/Y). There are exactly 625 possible predictions audited via Smart Contract.
ComoFunciona.card1Desc: Choose 5 coordinates from the Matrix (e.g., 10/5, 25/25). The insertion order defines the score tier (1 to 5 points).
ComoFunciona.card2Desc: The round closes on Saturday. Chainlink VRF audits and inserts results on-chain to ensure real entropy.
ComoFunciona.card3Desc: After the Saturday draw, the cascade calculation occurs, and winners claim their yields on Sundays.
ComoFunciona.step1Desc: Upon confirming your entry, you'll receive a link to BaseScan. You can also find it in your wallet history.
ComoFunciona.step2Desc: On BaseScan, scroll to the Overview tab and click the Decode Input Data button. This translates blockchain code into readable numbers.
ComoFunciona.step3Desc: Once the block is confirmed, no one (not even developers) can alter your numbers. Your predictions are mathematically secure.

Premiacao.title: Prize Structure
Premiacao.desc: The protocol distributes 90% of everything collected directly to participants. No intermediaries, governed by Smart Contracts.
Premiacao.distributionDesc: The value allocated to each tier is divided equally among all winners.
Premiacao.cascadeDesc1: If there are no winners in the 5-point tier, the 50% value does not stay with the house. It 'flows down' entirely to the 4-point tier.
Premiacao.rolloverDesc1: In the remote event that no participant hits even 1 point in the round, the total amount remains locked in the Smart Contract.
